```
Hibernate: 
    select ...
    from
        customer customer0_ 
    left outer join
        order order1 
            on customer.id=order.customer_id 
    where
        customer.id=?
```

```
Hibernate: 
    select ...
    from
        order order0_ 
    where
        order0_.customer_id in (
            select
                customer0_.id 
            from
                customer customer0_
        )
```
